description:
This intermediate level course on Technical Analytics is useful for those of you who wish to know more about the world of technical charting and how it impacts your trading decisions. A technical analyst uses charts and technical indicators to predict the future price movements. They are known for forecasting the probabilities of future price movements using price charts, volumes, patterns, trend lines, moving averages, and indicators.

The course begins with an introduction to trading concepts and the key terminology used in this space. Thereafter, the program introduces you to the various types of charts and overlays frequently used by technical analysts all over the world.
title: Technical Charting
